sentences.sContent: Having been suggested by a bat, people invented sonar.
sentences.sCn: 受到蝙蝠的启发，人们发明了声呐。

sentences.sContent: It is technically incorrect to talk about bat ‘radar’, since they do not use radio waves.
sentences.sCn: 严密来说，说蝙蝠有“雷达”系统是错误的，因为他们并不使用无线电波。
